typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as string,
		year_week as string,
		value as string,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> hospitallist
hospitallist select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		date,
		year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 split(source=="Surveillance",
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Surveillance, None)
ConditionalSplit1@Surveillance split(indicator=='Daily hospital occupancy',
	indicator=='Daily ICU occupancy',
	indicator=='Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k',
	indicator=='Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(Dailyhospitaloccupancy, DailyICUoccupancy, Weeklynewhospitaladmissionsper100k, WeeklynewICUadmissionsper100k, Others)
ConditionalSplit2@Dailyhospitaloccupancy sort(desc(value, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort1
ConditionalSplit1@None split(indicator=='Daily hospital occupancy',
	indicator=='Daily ICU occupancy',
	indicator=='Weekly new hospital admission per 100k',
	indicator=='Weekly new ICU admission per 100k',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit3@(Dailyhospitaloccupancy1, DailyICUoccupancy1, Weeklynewhospitaladmissionsper100k1, WeeklynewICUadmissionsper100k1, others)
ConditionalSplit2@DailyICUoccupancy sort(desc(value, true)) ~> Sort2
ConditionalSplit2@Weeklynewhospitaladmissionsper100k sort(desc(value, true)) ~> Sort3
ConditionalSplit2@Others sort(desc(value, true)) ~> Sort4
ConditionalSplit2@WeeklynewICUadmissionsper100k sort(desc(value, true)) ~> Sort5
ConditionalSplit3@Dailyhospitaloccupancy1 sort(desc(value, true)) ~> Sort6
ConditionalSplit3@DailyICUoccupancy1 sort(desc(value, true)) ~> Sort7
ConditionalSplit3@Weeklynewhospitaladmissionsper100k1 sort(desc(value, true)) ~> Sort8
ConditionalSplit3@WeeklynewICUadmissionsper100k1 sort(desc(value, true)) ~> Sort9
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as string,
		year_week as string,
		value as string,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		date,
		year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
